title: Tom Segura: Comedy 101
itunes:title: Tom Segura: Comedy 101
description:
Jeremy spends a lot of time on the road doing standup at clubs all over the world. Sometimes he gets to work with the best in the business like Tom Segura who sat down with Jeremy and handed him the keys to the kingdom.


Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold. 

IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Tom's IG: https://www.instagram.com/seguratom

Thanks to the sponsors:

Away: Explore Away's full range of all things travel and start your 100-day trial today by going to https://www.awaytravel.com/piven

LightStream: Apply now to get a special interest rate discount. Go to https://www.lightstream.com/piven
